text: anantaraM mayA siMhAsanAni dRSTAni tatra yE janA upAvizan tEbhyO vicArabhArO 'dIyata; anantaraM yIzOH sAkSyasya kAraNAd IzvaravAkyasya kAraNAcca yESAM zirazchEdanaM kRtaM pazOstadIyapratimAyA vA pUjA yai rna kRtA bhAlE karE vA kalagkO 'pi na dhRtastESAm AtmAnO 'pi mayA dRSTAH, tE prAptajIvanAstadvarSasahasraM yAvat khrISTEna sArddhaM rAjatvamakurvvan|
